verses.verse: הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> I am going שֹׁלֵחַ֙ <S%H7971><s%> Behold I will send מַלְאָכִ֔י <S%H4397><s%> my messenger וּפִנָּה־ <S%H6437><s%> and he shall prepare דֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way לְפָנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> before וּפִתְאֹם֩ <S%H6597><s%> shall suddenly יָב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his הֵיכָל֜וֹ <S%H1964><s%> to his temple הָאָד֣וֹן ׀ <S%H113><s%> me and the Lord אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you מְבַקְשִׁ֗ים <S%H1245><s%> whom ye seek וּמַלְאַ֨ךְ <S%H4397><s%> even the messenger הַבְּרִ֜ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom אַתֶּ֤ם <S%H859><s%> you חֲפֵצִים֙ <S%H2655><s%> whom ye delight הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold בָ֔א <S%H935><s%> in behold he shall come אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

וּמִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> who מְכַלְכֵּל֙ <S%H3557><s%> But who may abide אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the day בּוֹא֔וֹ <S%H935><s%> of his coming וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> who הָעֹמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> ? and who shall stand בְּהֵרָֽאוֹת֑וֹ <S%H7200><s%> when he appeareth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he כְּאֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire מְצָרֵ֔ף <S%H6884><s%> ? for he [is] like a refiner's וּכְבֹרִ֖ית <S%H1287><s%> soap מְכַבְּסִֽים׃ <S%H3526><s%> and like fullers'

וְיָשַׁ֨ב <S%H3427><s%> And he shall sit מְצָרֵ֤ף <S%H6884><s%> [as] a refiner וּמְטַהֵר֙ <S%H2891><s%> and purifier כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וְטִהַ֤ר <S%H2891><s%> and he shall purify אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the sons לֵוִי֙ <S%H3878><s%> of Levi וְזִקַּ֣ק <S%H2212><s%> and purge אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> כַּזָּהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> them as gold וְכַכָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and silver וְהָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD מַגִּישֵׁ֥י <S%H5066><s%> that they may offer מִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> an offering בִּצְדָקָֽה׃ <S%H6666><s%> in righteousness

וְעָֽרְבָה֙ <S%H6149><s%> be pleasant לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD מִנְחַ֥ת <S%H4503><s%> Then shall the offering יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וִירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem כִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> as in the days עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> of old וּכְשָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years קַדְמֹנִיּֽוֹת׃ <S%H6931><s%> and as in former

וְקָרַבְתִּ֣י <S%H7126><s%> And I will come near אֲלֵיכֶם֮ <S%H413><s%> to you לַמִּשְׁפָּט֒ <S%H4941><s%> to you to judgment וְהָיִ֣יתִי ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become עֵ֣ד <S%H5707><s%> witness מְמַהֵ֗ר <S%H4116><s%> and I will be a swift בַּֽמְכַשְּׁפִים֙ <S%H3784><s%> against the sorcerers וּבַמְנָ֣אֲפִ֔ים <S%H5003><s%> and against the adulterers וּבַנִּשְׁבָּעִ֖ים <S%H7650><s%> swearers לַשָּׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> and against false וּבְעֹשְׁקֵ֣י <S%H6231><s%> and against those that oppress שְׂכַר־ <S%H7939><s%> in [his] wages שָׂ֠כִיר <S%H7916><s%> the hireling אַלְמָנָ֨ה <S%H490><s%> the widow וְיָת֤וֹם <S%H3490><s%> and the fatherless וּמַטֵּי־ <S%H5186><s%> and that turn aside גֵר֙ <S%H1616><s%> the stranger וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יְרֵא֔וּנִי <S%H3372><s%> [from his right] and fear אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> not me saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> For I [am] the LORD לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁנִ֑יתִי <S%H8138><s%> I change וְאַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> O בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> not therefore ye sons יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> are not כְלִיתֶֽם׃ <S%H3615><s%> are not consumed

לְמִימֵ֨י <S%H3117><s%> Even from the days אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H1><s%> of your fathers סַרְתֶּ֤ם <S%H5493><s%> ye are gone away מֵֽחֻקַּי֙ <S%H2706><s%> from mine ordinances וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not שְׁמַרְתֶּ֔ם <S%H8104><s%> and have not kept שׁ֤וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> [them] Return אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> to me וְאָשׁ֣וּבָה <S%H7725><s%> unto me and I will return אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to you אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> unto you saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H559><s%> But ye said בַּמֶּ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> How נָשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> Wherein shall we return

הֲיִקְבַּ֨ע <S%H6906><s%> rob אָדָ֜ם <S%H120><s%> Will a man אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> angels כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you קֹבְעִ֣ים <S%H6906><s%> Wherein have we robbed אֹתִ֔י <S%H853><s%> וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H559><s%> me But ye say בַּמֶּ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> How קְבַעֲנ֑וּךָ <S%H6906><s%> robbed הַֽמַּעֲשֵׂ֖ר <S%H4643><s%> thee? In tithes וְהַתְּרוּמָֽה׃ <S%H8641><s%> and offerings

בַּמְּאֵרָה֙ <S%H3994><s%> with a curse אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> You נֵֽאָרִ֔ים <S%H779><s%> Ye [are] cursed וְאֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you קֹבְעִ֑ים <S%H6906><s%> for ye have robbed הַגּ֖וֹי <S%H1471><s%> me [even] this whole nation כֻּלּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3605><s%> the whole

הָבִ֨יאוּ <S%H935><s%> Bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הַֽמַּעֲשֵׂ֜ר <S%H4643><s%> ye all the tithes אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in mine house הָאוֹצָ֗ר <S%H214><s%> into the storehouse וִיהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become טֶ֙רֶף֙ <S%H2964><s%> that there may be meat בְּבֵיתִ֔י <S%H1004><s%> my house וּבְחָנ֤וּנִי <S%H974><s%> and prove נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> now בָּזֹ֔את <S%H2063><s%> me now herewith אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶפְתַּ֣ח <S%H6605><s%> if I will not open לָכֶ֗ם אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> אֲרֻבּ֣וֹת <S%H699><s%> you the windows הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וַהֲרִיקֹתִ֥י <S%H7324><s%> and pour you out לָכֶ֛ם בְּרָכָ֖ה <S%H1293><s%> a blessing עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בְּלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> corruption דָֽי׃ <S%H1767><s%> that [there shall] not [be room] enough

וְגָעַרְתִּ֤י <S%H1605><s%> And I will rebuke לָכֶם֙ בָּֽאֹכֵ֔ל <S%H398><s%> the devourer וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יַשְׁחִ֥ת <S%H7843><s%> for your sakes and he shall not destroy לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> the fruits הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> of your ground וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תְשַׁכֵּ֨ל <S%H7921><s%> cast her fruit לָכֶ֤ם הַגֶּ֙פֶן֙ <S%H1612><s%> neither shall your vine בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> before the time in the field אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

וְאִשְּׁר֥וּ <S%H833><s%> shall call you blessed אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> And all nations כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תִהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land חֵ֔פֶץ <S%H2656><s%> for ye shall be a delightsome אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts ס

חָזְק֥וּ <S%H2388><s%> have been stout עָלַ֛י <S%H5921><s%> against דִּבְרֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1697><s%> Your words אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> against me saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <S%H559><s%> Yet ye say מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What נִּדְבַּ֖רְנוּ <S%H1696><s%> What have we spoken עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

אֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <S%H559><s%> Ye have said שָׁ֖וְא <S%H7723><s%> It [is] vain עֲבֹ֣ד <S%H5647><s%> to serve אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> God וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> and what בֶּ֗צַע <S%H1215><s%> and what profit כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁמַ֙רְנוּ֙ <S%H8104><s%> [is it] that we have kept מִשְׁמַרְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4931><s%> his ordinance וְכִ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for הָלַ֙כְנוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> and that we have walked קְדֹ֣רַנִּ֔ית <S%H6941><s%> mournfully מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> appointed time

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> now אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we מְאַשְּׁרִ֣ים <S%H833><s%> happy זֵדִ֑ים <S%H2086><s%> the proud גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> only נִבְנוּ֙ <S%H1129><s%> are set up עֹשֵׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> yea they that work רִשְׁעָ֔ה <S%H7564><s%> wickedness גַּ֧ם <S%H1571><s%> also בָּחֲנ֛וּ <S%H974><s%> yea [they that] tempt אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God וַיִּמָּלֵֽטוּ׃ <S%H4422><s%> are even delivered

אָ֧ז <S%H227><s%> Then נִדְבְּר֛וּ <S%H1696><s%> spake often יִרְאֵ֥י <S%H3372><s%> feared יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> to another וַיַּקְשֵׁ֤ב <S%H7181><s%> hearkened יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD וַיִּשְׁמָ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> and heard וַ֠יִּכָּתֵב <S%H3789><s%> was written סֵ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> [it] and a book זִכָּר֤וֹן <S%H2146><s%> of remembrance לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> before לְיִרְאֵ֣י <S%H3372><s%> fear יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וּלְחֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H2803><s%> and that thought שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> upon his name

וְהָ֣יוּ <S%H1961><s%> become לִ֗י אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> And they shall be mine saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts לַיּ֕וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I עֹשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> when I make up סְגֻלָּ֑ה <S%H5459><s%> my jewels וְחָמַלְתִּ֣י <S%H2550><s%> and I will spare עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> after יַחְמֹ֣ל <S%H2550><s%> spareth אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> them as a man עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> his own בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his own son הָעֹבֵ֥ד <S%H5647><s%> that serveth אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְשַׁבְתֶּם֙ <S%H7725><s%> Then shall ye return וּרְאִיתֶ֔ם <S%H7200><s%> and discern בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between צַדִּ֖יק <S%H6662><s%> between the righteous לְרָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> and the wicked בֵּ֚ין <S%H996><s%> between עֹבֵ֣ד <S%H5647><s%> between him that serveth אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> God לַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> does not עֲבָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H5647><s%> and him that serveth ס
